examples.example: 我的妈妈总是用温暖的笑容和鼓励的话语支持着我前行。

translate.english: My mother always supports me to move forward with a warm smile and encouraging words.

examples.example: 我的妈妈会用她满满的爱为我烹制美味的菜肴。

translate.english: My mother will use her full love to cook delicious dishes for me.

examples.example: 亲爱的妈妈总是无私地为我付出，给予我无尽的关爱。

translate.english: Dear mother always selflessly pays for me and gives me endless love.
